casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alton BORDEN. No. 134P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Relief:

*135"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
